THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls: Gravure For You! Vol. 6

name: The Idolmaster: Cinderella Girls - Gravure for You! Vol.6
summary:
This volume continues the ability to take pictures of two idols at a time, and to add music from CDs into the BGM list.
Idol Focus: Ranko Kanzaki
Costumes: Holy Night Snow, Arrow-Feather-Patterned Hakama, Sailor Swimsuit
Locations: Christmas Corner, Western-Style Cafe, Seaside
